attributes.action: create, as a matter of urgency, an independent review body who will be reponsible to determining MPs pay and allowances and before doing so refer the conduct of Derek Conway MP to the Metropolitan Police for investigation and prosecution if the facts warrant such action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs pay and allowances are determined by themselves. An internal review, chaired by the Speaker, will not inspire any public confidence so action is needed now.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister does not refer people to the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
